channel.title: A better/more up-to-date Delta
channel.description:
Well, since I haven't done anything with RSPS for months and I want to create a server again, I've decided to create this topic. I'm not fully sure if I should release it when finished or if I should host it.
In this server pretty much every content will be created from scratch. The goal of this server is to create a decent delta with tons of features.
[size=12pt]- Progress -[/size]
Red = Not started Orange = In progress Green = Completed
[size=12pt]Combat:[/size] ●Special Attacks ●Formula's ●Basic attacking (players and npcs) ●Correct animations
[size=12pt]Ranged:[/size] ●Special Attacks ●Basic ranging (players and npcs) ●Accumulator ●Hand Cannon ●Crossbows and bolts with effects ●Correct animations
[size=12pt]Magic:[/size] ●All spells work ●Formula's ●Spell effects ●Autocasting ●Correct animations/graphics
[size=12pt]Dungeoneering:[/size] ●Can't take any items with you ●Normal and Hard mode ●Shop inside dungeoneering ●Random Monsters ●Multiple floors ●Reward shop
[size=12pt]Thieving:[/size] ●Pickpocketing ●Stealing from stalls
[size=12pt]Mining:[/size] ●All pickaxes work ●All rocks work ●Level requirements for rocks/pickaxes ●Decent formula
[size=12pt]Runecrafting:[/size] ●Able to create all runes ●Combining tiara's ●Multiple runes per essence ●Entering/leaving runecrafting area's ●Talisman's pull towards runecrafting altar
[size=12pt]Crafting:[/size] ●Pottery ●Gem cutting ●Amulet Stringing ●Tanning
[size=12pt]Firemaking:[/size] ●All logs work ●Clipped walking ●Instant firemaking after burning one log ●Firemaking level depends on how quick the Hand Cannon explodes
[size=12pt]Minigames:[/size] ●God Wars ●Entering all boss area's ●Entering chambers with killcounts ●Monster and boss spawns ●Other objects (including altar)
[size=6pt]More progress to add...[/size]
[size=12pt]Misc updates:[/size]
● Fillables ● Making flour ● Pickables ● Ship travelling ● Clipping ● Weight ● Skill guides ● Music (will be put in an option to turn it off) ● New player saving system to prevent mass saves ● Mystery Box (Not sure if it will stay since i can't think of a way to let players obtain it) ● Improved Dialogue System ● Netty networking and no thread per client
[size=12pt]Media:[/size] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zghr9z.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/3026yjq.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zf7ep1.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/wgq3wn.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/4hwfwg.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/35a3nfs.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/6y04s9.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/64lzxc.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/28co7c6.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/9pwcjo.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/260psle.png[/img]
More media will be added soon...

Most likely switching to 459 gameframe etc (because suggested and because it’s my favorite), currently configuring the server to fully work with the new client.

EDIT:
Fully switched to new oldschool client, worked alot on the combat system, and added barrows degrading

33osfnt.png747×491

*Didn’t add that players must be in wildy yet.

item.title: A better/more up-to-date Delta
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

I’m thinking to change the client/server to have limited revision items/gameframe/anims/gfx etc.

I would like your opinions on which I should pick:

  1. 562 gameframe, 634 items, 602+ anims/gfx etc. (current client)
  2. 459 gameframe, 459 items, 459 anims/gfx (No godswords, but with defenders and torso etc)
  3. 474 gameframe, 474 items, 474 anims/gfx (With godswords)
  4. 459 gameframe, 474 items, 474 anims/gfx (With godswords, Slightly older gameframe)

459 gameframe example:

474 gameframe example:

Read full topic

item.title: A better/more up-to-date Delta
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:36, topic:518498”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=636764.msg4314442#msg4314442 date=1371229460]

$6 a month. $20 per year

How is this possible?

[quote author=Ambokile link=topic=636764.msg4314410#msg4314410 date=1371225694]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=636764.msg4314388#msg4314388 date=1371222971]

[quote author=Ambokile link=topic=636764.msg4314385#msg4314385 date=1371222739]

$6 a month. $20 per year

How is this possible?
[/quote]look at the ram…
[/quote]I wasn’t talking about the specs. I was wondering how he can pay $6 a month for a total of $20 per year?
[/quote]the specs is the reason why it’s so cheap

Again, I was not talking about the price, I was wondering how he said it was $6 a month and $20 a year at the same time. Thankyou Enzo
[/quote]Yeah you didn’t specify just saying.

I did the second time. “how can he pay $6 a month for a total of $20 per year”[/quote]which can still be took more than one way. I translated it as

"how can he pay $6 a month for a $20 per year? What makes it so cheap? "

Read full topic

item.title: A better/more up-to-date Delta
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:25, topic:518498”][quote author=enzo42 link=topic=636764.msg4314050#msg4314050 date=1371164371]

To host this all you’d need is $6 a month. $20 per year vps

VPS of $20 a year? How bad are the specifications of that

EDIT: Does anyone know if a VPS can be bought using like paysafe? or does it HAVE to be with credit card?
[/quote]

Not too bad.[/quote]

Which site is that?

EDIT: Implementing netty networking, currently having some saving/loading bugs, but the rest seems to be working.

EDIT2: Looks like the netty networking is working, no more terrible networking and thread per client anymore.

EDIT3: Fixed up the last bugs with networking, it’s working fine now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:21, topic:518498”]This project looks as if it’s actually going somewhere. I can’t say I’m surprised though based on your Delta++ release.

You should host this. We need more Delta’s out there, that are actually worth playing…[/quote]

I would host, but I’m not sure how I can buy a VPS (I have the money but I don’t know with what I can pay it).
And I’m not sure how to get players really, I don’t want to run a server with only like 5 players.

Read full topic

item.title: A better/more up-to-date Delta
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

Ambokile:

Can you go into more detail about your Dungeoneering system?

It’s probably going to be quite simple dungeoneering, there will be 2 modes (normal and hard), and it will pretty much be just killing some npcs, and at the end a boss. I will probably make it possible to create some kind of team, making it possible to dung with others.

Re-bump because it dropped off the first page.

Started working on a dialogue system from scratch, it doesn’t use process anymore.

Read full topic
